issue.title: dorawatch.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://dorawatch.net](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdorawatch.net) ### Comment > im trying to watch movies and shows but the adblock dosent block the popups. i probably got a virus as my computer is very slow now. ``` Username: @THELASTSIGMAOFALLALPHAS69420 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/j97dzegapy0c4o44gcgkwok04c04o0k4gop49pcyd8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.146 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.1.146&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=3&browser=chrome&filters=2.10&userscripts_enabled=false&browsing_security_enabled=false&browsing_security_statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&is_third_party_cookies=false&is_first_party_cookies=false&is_referrer=false&is_user_agent=false)
